us.conxio.HL7.HL7Stream
Class HL7FileReader

java.lang.Object
  us.conxio.HL7.HL7Stream.HL7StreamBase
      us.conxio.HL7.HL7Stream.HL7FileReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
HL7MessageHandler, HL7Stream
public class HL7FileReader
extends HL7StreamBase
implements HL7Stream

Reads HL7 (v.2.x) transaction messages from a file.

public java.lang.String readMsg(java.lang.String argFileName)

Reads a HL7 Message String from the context stream. If the stream is not already open, at the time of the call, this method opens the stream using the argument file name.
